recipesJson.name: Summer Lovin'
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: I had a strawberry watermelon menthol from USA Vape Lab and it was fantastic. I wanted to make something similar but more strawberry and colder and that is what I came up with....This Vape is very COLD..I am a menthol kinda guy so you will see a lot of my mixes float down that alley..I haven't tried to make this without the cold If you do please let me know how it turned out..For me it is the perfect amount of cooling for some it will be way to high so it may need to be adjusted but for me it is perfect!!
